website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its bright images and minimal crosstalk, the Nvidia 3D Vision 2 glasses with Lightboost are the current best 3D solution for gaming and watching movies on the PC.
pros: The Nvidia 3D Vision 2 glasses have a snug, comfy fit, hold a long charge, and sport the best 3D performance on any PC
cons: There's still noticeable crosstalk during games and the $85 price is asking a lot

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very comfortable. I don't have prescription glasses and even rarely wear sunglasses, so I'm one of a few people not used to glasses at all. But I have absolutely no problem staying in these glasses for many hours. The battery life is also very good. I was very sad to find out that Nvidia is discontinuing 3D Vision. I bought an extra pair (I already had 2 pairs) because I'm afraid that they disappear from the market soon. I think 3D Vision is one of the best 3D technologies from the picture quality perspective.
customer_reviews.author: User365643

customer_reviews.title: All you need for Dell 3D Laptops
customer_reviews.text: I have a dell XPS 1701 laptop with a Nvidia 3d screen. The transmitter is built-into the laptop and the screen is supposed to be a special screen. Dell in their infinite wisdom did not include a pair of Nvidia 3d glasses. To get my laptop running this was all I needed. I just went through a configuration wizard where a spot below the dell logo turned green to inform me I was in 3d mode. The glasses are also auto-off so don't keep trying to hold the power button to turn it off. I did have to update my Cyberlink PowerDVD software to play the latest 3D movies! Good luck, 3D looks awesome, even on a small 17" screen!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing. I read so many DOA reviews that I thought it was a fluke for them. Apparently its not. Ordered a new one "unopened" (even though there's no seal that keeps you from opening. The glasses werent covered completely with a sealed bag. Same thing happened to me. Straight out of the package, doesnt work. Charged it for the last 3 hours, then again with the original cable that came with my first glasses, didn't work. Such a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: NIce Pair of Glasses for use with the NVIDIA Emitter
customer_reviews.text: NIce Pair of Glasses for use with the NVIDIA Emitter, nice quality, let you see the images brighter, are quite comfortable. The battery goes three movies straight without recharge. Cons: * If the baterry goes dead you can't sustitute them so it means your full Glasses become a piece of useless plastic * Extremely Expensive, you need to buy a Nvidia GeForce Card (250US$ min), the NVIDIA 3D Vision Kit (150US$) and you should pay 100 bucks for each extra pair, its just ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Larry171

customer_reviews.title: Better then V1
customer_reviews.text: I bought these extra glasses to work with the existing Dongle that cam with the Version 1 kit. They are brighter and don't suffer from interference like my older glasses. They are also much more comfortable even though they could be lighter. I honestly think they should make these fit more like sunglasses bit I've been told that they fit over existing prescription frames so i can't be selfish. 3D vision is really amazing with games and movies when they are supported properly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I am assuming it is the battery, but regardless the glasses did not work at all and the charging light would stay on indefinitely. I would have preferred to have them replaced, but Amazon does not allow replacements (only returns) since it is sold by a 3rd party. Would have been a good deal if they had worked.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Larger than the old ones
customer_reviews.text: These fit great over my glasses and comfortable for me. I do wish there was an optional blinder to slip on the sides (like the old horse blinders) to keep out outside light as 3D is dimmer on my computer and room lights are more of a bother. Yes, I can turn out the lights... Now I have an extra set for when someone visits.
customer_reviews.author: Heartland IndianaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: excellent 3d active shutter glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and comes with 3 adjustable pads for nose, but they all suck and it *is* heavy. I wish they could cut off some unnecessary weight (like taking off the bottom black plastic border etc). I had really light rechargable 3d glasses back in 2002 (the ones that used with CRT monitors) so i know its possible to have really light cool looking 3d glasses (thus taken away one star).
customer_reviews.author: Goldenhawk

customer_reviews.title: All in all about just as good as the originals.
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra field of few, hate the temple pinching headache inducing lack of ergonomics, if i werent a headphone playing gamer that streamed a lot i would still be using the more comfortable original d3 vision glasses that came with my rf transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Hatta

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the "standard" nvidia stereoscopic glasses with the rubbery arms. They're cozier and the battery doesn't drain when they're not being used (the rubbery glasses DO lose battery when they're not being used).
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my Nvidia 3D Vision 2 kit
customer_reviews.text: Have had no problems with the glasses. They work great just like the originals with my Nvidia 3D Vision 2 kit. in fact I can't even tell the two apart so i'm not sure which one is which now. it is nice having the extra set so I can share 3D experience with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES C.

customer_reviews.title: Need A Compatible Monitor/TV
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL! Make sure your TV/Monitor is compatible. Mine wasn't :( Just because you have the right video card, doesn't mean these will work. You will need the infrared emitter that comes in the "Nvidia 3D Vision 2 Wireless Glasses Kit" as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vivilux

customer_reviews.title: A good review
customer_reviews.text: I stepped on my last pair of glasses and broke them. Using Nvidia 3d vision this extra pair synced up fine without having to install anything extra. These things also have extremely long battery length. I have left them unplugged for weeks and then used it for a few hours, never ran out of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, just as stated. All you have to do is charge them and they are ready to use with the NVidia 3D Vision 2. The only problem is that even though they come with 3 different nosepieces, they still bother a little after wearing them for more than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Trinexus

customer_reviews.title: Better than the first version
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. They do what they are supposed to and work perfectly with my setup. They are larger and much more comfortable than the first version of nvidia glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: way better than originals and its nice to have an extra ...
customer_reviews.text: way better than originals and its nice to have an extra pair so a friend can also watch the 3d action... this glasses and the old one work off the same infrared transmitter..
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this item together with my 3D Vision Kit. The items are great but the glasses arms press in my head. after some time of playing or watching I feel bad. The other features are great.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 pairs: 1 not working(dead battery).
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pcs glasses and 1 is not working. Battery is dead. Tried to charge it several times and even tried for 24 hrs charging but no sign of power. I have to return it. The other piece is working okay and tested it although upon opening the box i found some shallow scratches on the lens. Seller should check the unit before delivery. Anyway I keep the one with scratches the other one have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Famillaran

customer_reviews.title: 3D gaming is awesome, I bought this for an extra pair to ...
customer_reviews.text: 3D gaming is awesome, I bought this for an extra pair to show off my gaming pc .. high quality
customer_reviews.author: direditor

customer_reviews.title: Simple item without complications.
customer_reviews.text: I like that these glasses are still supported on the first generation of 3D Vision. They have a larger area and feel much more comfortable. I prefer them to the original ones.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to sync
customer_reviews.text: The pair that came with my Qosmio 3D laptop got smashed so i ordered these and I had to send back on pair and the second still isnt syncing properly, my original ones were perfect though
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even work.. 2nd pair of glasses, charge to full, turn on and than they turn off seconds later.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy, Starting to make cracking sounds they are stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these and the laptop they were supposed to come with because 17 inches, is too small as well for 3D.
customer_reviews.author: Sebring

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I am very happy with my purchase. The quality and price was great! I would definitely recommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: See 3D... Weeeeee!
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. They have slim arms that fit under earphones if you are gaming or watching a movie and trying not to wake up your family. I'm sure they are designed to fit the widest range of head shapes so don't look for a very comfortable fit with these. That being said they do come with three different replaceable nose pieces for more comfort. They are comfortable enough to wear during a three hour movie. After that, its probably time to take a break from 3D anyway. The wireless feature works flawlessly and they stay charged for an appropriate length of time. They have a USB cord to charge the battery. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses work well and weren't terribly expensive. They provide me with an extra pair of 3D glasses for when someone else wants to watch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt V.

customer_reviews.title: Trashy fit
customer_reviews.text: Work great but to me 3D is a waist of money. They heart after a while of wearing them. Sorry NVidia Excellent product but, the fit is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia 3D Vision 2 glasses are Amazing
customer_reviews.text: i already had one set of Nvidia 3D vision glasses and love them, that's why I purchased a second pair. The 3D quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LisaD1l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great glasses i used for gaming on steam with and watch movie & TV series & documentary .
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Isa Almahmeed

customer_reviews.title: the best 3d glasses you can buy
customer_reviews.text: They work perfect and are a little bigger then my first pair. Great buy for the money works great with my duel Nivida 580 cards in my area 51 ALX .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery as expected , on time, no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a Acer 27in monitor and it came with the gen1 glasses. This pair is was more comfortable than the others and work great. They do fit better over my glasses and that is a big plus for long gaming hours.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenBoyTX

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived with a dead battery: Going on 12 hours and it has yet to charge (manual indicates it should take 3 hours). I have tried both computer USB and wall charger. Glasses are inoperative even with USB cable providing power.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These work amazing, are comfortable to wear, and do not leave marks on the face. There seem to be no glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: David Pike
customer_reviews.text: These 3D vision glasses pair up perfectly with the Asus VG278h 3D ready monitor and Nvidia Video card. The 3D really comes alive with these glasses and they fit well over my prescription glasses. I like the lighter and more viewing space.
customer_reviews.author: David Pike

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time with everything expected. The product functioned as advertised; as a word of caution, the glasses will flicker with awkward light sources or when facing away from the 3d vision dongle, but that's more limitation of the tech than problem with the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Holmes

customer_reviews.title: 3 Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 pairs. 2 from one seller and 2 from another seller. 3 of the 4 pairs came dead. If you plug them in and they don't turn on after charging for a little while, the batteries are dead. If you pop them open, you will see a swollen lipo battery. The batteries can be replaced pretty cheap/easily if you feel like going that route. The glasses do work great and are easy to setup. I am assuming these sellers are selling off old stock. Not sure if Nvidia is even making these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J. Fite

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I'd have an extra pair for a 3-d laptop they work great, but I didn't expect them not to be great.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin boyd

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: 3d glasses arrived in time. The product seemed to be working right but when i tried them, the 3d glasses did not work. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: orlando

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: way better than nvidia 1 glasses.. no complaints... besides price.. but they r worth it in the long run if you like and can do 3d... do not get nvidia vision 1 over nvidia vision 2... 1 lacks a lot compared to #2's...
customer_reviews.author: Jere Drummachine!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nvidia 3D Vision 1
customer_reviews.text: The design is improved in comfort and button placement over original design. Improvement in picture brightness is not significant when watching bright TV/Monitors. It is noticable when navigating the room you are sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Z Anger

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: very good! the finish is good, did everything he should do! the store is very quick to send! I'm currently using it without any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE ITEM WAS SUPPOSED TO BE NEW!! Not that lucky, this item never worked out of the box. don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Ra'Shawd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were brand new and charged full and worked through two 3d movies and 2 hours of Street Fighter x Tekken and still green power indicator.
customer_reviews.author: Decibel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product best fitting highest quality 3D glasses I have used
customer_reviews.text: The fit and feel of these glasses is the best of any brand I have tried. The 3D on my Toshiba laptop is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond M Susnik

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia 3D glasses
customer_reviews.text: Worked great though a little expensive. I had tried other brands that did not work as well. Would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: CLsoulja

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: it's a very good 3D glasses, it's amazing!!! i love it. this at a good price. and. . . .
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Came dead
customer_reviews.text: I bought TWO pairs on 2 occasions. Both pairs came with absolutely no charge in the battery (0 volts) meaning they can NOT be charged back up again. Orange light blinks when on usb but will not kickstart the battery. Waste of $200
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell G. Zakas

product_meta.title: NVIDIA 3D Vision 2 Wireless Glasses Extra Pair
product_meta.description: Shipping Height: 4.3 Shipping Width: 7.5 Master Pack Qty: 10 General Information Manufacturer: NVIDIA Corporation Manufacturer Part Number: 942-11431-0003-001 Brand Name: nVIDIA Product Line: 3D Vision 2 Product Name: 3D Vision 2 Wireless Glasses Kit Marketing Information: Discover the difference NVIDIA 3D Vision 2 can make in your gaming experience. The new gamer-inspired glasses have 20% larger lenses to give you the most viewing area with the least light leakage. They also work great with the innovative NVIDIA 3D LightBoost technology, which makes your screen up to 2x brighter for better 3D gaming and video viewing. Plus, 3D Vision 2 glasses are built from state of the art, softer materials designed to deliver more comfort and better fit. Product Type: 3D Glasses Technical Information Glass Technology: Active Shutter Viewing Distance: 15 ft Synchronization Method: Infrared Application/Usage: Monitor Application/Usage: Notebook Application/Usage: Projector Application/Usage: All-in-One PC Application/Usage: Television Battery Information Battery Rechargeable: Yes Physical Characteristics Height: 1.6 Width: 6.5 Depth: 6.4 Weight (Approximate): 1.98 oz Miscellaneous Package Contents: 1 x 3D Vision Glasses 1 x 6ft USB Cable 1 x Storage Pouch 2 x Nose Pieces Quick Start Guide Software CD.
